txt.en: 'I've already gotten some complaints about noises down in the cellar....'
'Go on down to the cellar and see to those complaints.'
'I hear it... do you? You'd best prove your worth and go check it out.'
'I'll finish up here... it's time for you to go down to the cellar and check things out.'
'Can you hear that wailing? Definitely something amiss down there....'
